channel.title: Googie Burger – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: On the Road: Googie Burger
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is another installment of Chow Down Orlando on the road, this time from Atlanta. It’s pretty clear that I’m a huge fan of a messy burger so when we stumbled on Googie Burger in Centennial Park, I had to stop and see what it was. Good thing it was lunch time because this place […]

The post On the Road: Googie Burger appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is another installment of Chow Down Orlando on the road, this time from Atlanta.

It’s pretty clear that I’m a huge fan of a messy burger so when we stumbled on Googie Burger in Centennial Park, I had to stop and see what it was. Good thing it was lunch time because this place looked like a winner.

This is the Googie Pig. Think a quality, Five Guys style burger with all the fixing, but tipped with honey-mustard BBQ pulled pork. Absolutely delicious.

Equally delicious were the onion rings which were like no onion rings I’ve ever had. Giant doesn’t even come close to describe the size of these things. Equal to the size is the taste. These things were battered and fried in what tasted like a fried chicken batter which was a completely different taste than expected, but in a really good way.

Googie Burger puts the typical Atlanta burger staple, The Varsity, to shame.

The post On the Road: Googie Burger appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
